headline.main: China Premier Pledges: 'We Will Make Our Skies Blue Again'
headline.print_headline: China Premier Pledges: 'We Will Make Our Skies Blue Again'

lead_paragraph: Chinese Premier Li Keqiang pledged Sunday to make the country's smoggy skies blue again and "work faster" to address pollution caused by the burning of coal for heat and electricity.
snippet: Chinese Premier Li Keqiang pledged Sunday to make the country's smoggy skies blue again and "work faster" to address pollution caused by the burning of coal for heat and electricity....
